Text.Page:
Back so soon? Or have we even met yet? Time flows differently here...

...was amazing! I saw the entire battle from here. The world that Valona was stitching together from the tatters of the Dream is no more...

...calls itself Valona, and claims to be the "Master of All Time and Space." If it isn't stopped, it could unmake all of reality!

Welcome! I'm Alarikâ€”I investigate strange phenomena for the Unified Theory Institute.

...partially-formed sphere, there in the sky? You can just make out the Nucleus, where a being of godlike power is rearranging space and time to build its own version of the Dream...
